Name: Written corpus ccKres 1.0
Description: This corpus includes balanced Slovenian texts (newspapers, magazines, computer-mediated communication, fiction and non-fiction) published between 1990 and 2011. The corpus is encoded in TEI. Non-linguistic metadata includes information on source, year of publication, text type, title, author. This corpus is a downloadable subset of the balanced Kres corpus. It can be downloaded from the CLARIN.SI repository.
